transfer.description: Transfers `amount` tokens from the caller's account to `recipient`.

transferFrom.description: Transfers `amount` tokens from `sender` to `recipient` using allowance.

approve.description: Allows `spender` to withdraw `amount` tokens from the caller's account.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given initial supply.

acceptOwnership.description: Accepts the ownership of the contract from the pending governor.

renounceMinter.description: Renounces the minter role of the caller.

burn.description: Burns `_amount` tokens from the caller's account.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used for the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that `spender` is allowed to withdraw from `owner`.

governor.description: Returns the current governor of the contract.

pendingGovernor.description: Returns the address of the pending governor.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to `_newGovernor`.

permit.description: Allows `spender` to withdraw `_value` tokens from `_owner` using a signature.
